Truein - Customer Success Manager

Location - Pune Office, Work Type: Full time

Support Topsupport July 01, 2022

Truein is a fast-growing B2B SaaS product company, offering Attendance & Timesheet solution to the companies with Contractual and Distributed workforce. 200+ customers across the globe now believe in what we do and have embarked on this journey with us.

Attendance tracking across multiple locations, Frequently changing staff, remote work sites, payroll-ready reports, and Workforce productivity – are some of the key problems faced by organizations across the globe.

At Truein, we are on a mission to bring transparency and controls in the attendance process. We leverage Face recognition and AI technology to create a seamless experience for both organization and their staff. We are backed by Investors and a high potential team.

Job brief:

We are looking for a Customer Success Manager to join our team. The candidate should be able to contribute to building relationships, implementing new programs that will increase your business’ revenue potentials and minimize churn rates. It is an individual contributor role wherein the person would work with a small but highly competitive and effective team

Responsibilities:

  • Customer onboarding: help them setup product configuration and upload data
  • Conduct product training for key stakeholders in the customer organization
  • Technical/product Support: Address customer queries by phone, emails and helpdesk tickets
  • Contact customers to explain new features and help them upgrade to new plan
  • Collect feedback, testimonial, create case studies
  • Ensure retention and create great customer experience
  • Work closely with product and sales team

Requirements:

  • 1 to 4 years years of experience in SaaS or software product company in customer-facing role
  • Active listening skills and Effective communication
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Strong empathy for customers and passion for growth
  • Result-oriented and has great attention to details

Good to have:

  • Previous experience working with enterprise customers
  • Has worked at growth stage startup
  • Experience dealing with International customers

You will get:

  • Competitive compensation package and benefits
  • Work closely with and be part of a truly amazing team
  • Join a fast-growing company early, make a difference and enjoy the ride
  • Challenge yourself and take your career to the next level
Apply
